document.full_text: given a judge's ruling against the n.f.l. regarding its tv rights deals, it's going to be hard for the league to  claim that it has a higher commitment to bargaining than the union.
document.title: demaurice smith's rebuttal in the rain
lines_and_colors: given a judge's ruling against the n.f.l. regarding its tv rights deals, it's going to be hard for the league to  claim that it has a higher commitment to bargaining than the union.
